basic.name: Noxious Blossom (Q)
basic.description: After 0.5 seconds, cause an area to explode with pollen dealing 160 damage. {highlight}Increase Radius by 25% when one enemy has three stacks os Nature Toxin.{/highlight}

basic.name: Crippling Spores (W)
basic.description: Enemies currently afflicted by Nature's Toxin have its duration increased by 3 seconds and are Slowed by 40% decaying over 3 seconds.

basic.name: Wisp (E)
basic.description: Spawn a Wisp to scout an area. Can be redirected once active. When the Wisp is in a bush for more 2 seconds, its vision radius is increased by 75%.  Lasts 45 seconds.

basic.name: Relocate Wisp (E)
basic.description: Moves the Wisp to a new location.

heroic.name: Thornwood Vine (R)
heroic.description: Send forth vines that deal 184 damage to all enemies in a line.Stores up to 3 charges.

heroic.name: Leaping Strike (R)
heroic.description: Leap over an enemy, Slowing them by 80% for 0.35 seconds and dealing 271 damage.Stores up to 2 charges.

trait.name: Nature's Toxin (T)
trait.description: Lunara's Basic Attacks and damaging Abilities poison their target, dealing 33 damage a second for 3 seconds. Every additional application increases the duration by 3 seconds, up to a maximum of 9 seconds.

1.name: Sentinel Wisp
1.description: After remaining in a bush for 5 seconds, Wisp's vision radius is increased by 200% and reveals the surrounding area.

1.name: Flower of poison
1.description: {highlight}After staying still for 3 seconds Wisps apply one stack of Nature Toxin each second on area, lasts 3 seconds.{/highlight}

1.name: Detonate
1.description: {highlight}Activate to detonate the closest Wisp of your mouse. When Wisps are destroyed or detonated they deal 400 damage to summoned units and 405 shield damage. If Lunara doesn't receive damage or basic attack on the last 2 seconds increase Dryad's Swiftness movement speed bonus by 10%{/highlight}

4.name: Nature Spirits
4.description: {highlight}Wisps will heal allied heros near them by 40 per second. This effect is doubled on bushes{/highlight}

4.name: Nature's Culling
4.description: Increases Nature's Toxin's damage by 125% to non-Heroes.

4.name: Siphoning Toxin
4.description: Heal 9 (+4%/level) per second while an enemy has Nature's Toxin. Additional 19 (+4%/level) per second healing if an enemy Hero has 3 stacks.
passives: {highlight}Nature Toxin reveals enemies for its duration{/highlight}

7.name: Splintered Spear
7.description: Using Noxious Blossom causes Lunara's next Basic Attack to hit up to 4 enemies. These extra attacks can apply Nature's Toxin.
passives: {highlight}Increase Lunara Basic Attack Damage by 10% for each current stack of Nature Toxin active on enemy heroes.{/highlight}

7.name: Choking Pollen
7.description: Noxious Blossom deals 100% more damage to enemies afflicted by Nature's Toxin, increased to 175% against enemies with 3 stacks.

7.name: Sickening Effects
7.description: {highlight}Noxious Blossom creates an area that lasts for 2.5. Enemy heros on that area will have their healing reduced by 20%, this effect will be increased to 50% if they have three stacks of Nature Toxin{/highlight}

10.name: Thornwood Vine
10.description: Send forth vines that deal 184 damage to all enemies in a line.Stores up to 3 charges.

10.name: Leaping Strike
10.description: Leap over an enemy, Slowing them by 80% for 0.35 seconds and dealing 271 damage.Stores up to 2 charges.

13.name: Let Them Wither
13.description: Increases Crippling Spores' Slow duration by 1 second and causes it to no longer decay.
passives: {highlight}Crippling Spores cooldown reduced by 2s if cast while two or more Heroes have Nature's Toxin.{/highlight}

13.name: Abolish Magic
13.description: Target an ally to remove all damage over time and disabling effects from them and Lunara. For 2 seconds after, the duration of disabling effects is reduced by 50%.

13.name: ZWOOP
13.description: {highlight}Lunara leaps backward, dodge enemy incoming projectiles and launches a basic attack on three of the furthest enemy units within range{/highlight}

16.name: Accelerated Contamination
16.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Noxious Blossom from 60 to 40.  While at least 1 enemy Hero is afflicted with Nature's Toxin, Noxious Blossom's cooldown recharges 75% faster.

16.name: Invigorating Spores
16.description: Crippling Spores grants 30% Attack Speed for 6 seconds.  Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes with 3 stacks of Nature's Toxin deal damage equal to 1.5% of their maximum Health.

16.name: Nature's call
16.description: {highlight}When Lunara cast Wisp it will also summon 3 additional wisps that can't be controlled and each one will move to the closest bushes to Lunara.{/highlight}

20.name: Forest's Wrath
20.description: Thornwood Vine now applies 2 stacks of Nature's Toxin.  Increase Thornwood Vine's range by 30% and Lunara's vision radius by 35%.

20.name: Boundless Stride
20.description: {highlight}Everytime you use on an target that is not affected by Nature Toxin you receive another charge. Leaping Strike now can be used on allies.{/highlight}

20.name: Intensifying Toxin
20.description: At 3 stacks, Nature's Toxin deals {highlight}20%{/highlight} more damage, {highlight}that damage is increased to 60% on slowed targets{/highlight}
passives: {highlight}Increase Dryad's swiftness movement speed bonus by 7.5% for each enemy hero with 3 stacks{/highlight}

20.name: Greater Spell Shield
20.description: {highlight}Activate to become immune to spell damage for 6 seconds{/highlight}
